SELECT id, concat(concat(saga_code,'-'),id) saga_code, status, start_time, end_time, ref_type, ref_id FROM asgard_saga_instance WHERE 1 = 1
AND FD_LEVEL=#{level}
AND SOURCE_ID=#{sourceId}
AND concat(concat(saga_code, '-'), id) LIKE concat(concat('%',#{sagaCode}),'%')
AND status LIKE concat(concat('%',#{status}),'%')
AND ref_type LIKE concat(concat('%',#{refType}),'%')
AND ref_id LIKE concat(concat('%',#{refId}),'%')
AND( concat(concat(saga_code, '-'), id) LIKE concat(concat('%',#{params}),'%') OR status LIKE concat(concat('%',#{params}),'%') OR ref_type LIKE concat(concat('%',#{params}),'%') OR ref_id LIKE concat(concat('%',#{params}),'%') )

SELECT asi.ID AS ID, asi.SAGA_CODE AS SAGA_CODE, aos.DESCRIPTION AS DESCRIPTION, aos.SERVICE as SERVICE, asi.FD_LEVEL AS LEVEL, asi.REF_TYPE AS REF_TYPE, asi.REF_ID AS REF_ID, asi.START_TIME AS START_TIME, asi.END_TIME AS END_TIME, sum(CASE WHEN asti. STATUS = 'COMPLETED' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS COMPLETED, sum(CASE WHEN asti. STATUS = 'RUNNING' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS RUNNING, sum(CASE WHEN asti. STATUS = 'ROLLBACK' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS ROLLBACK, sum(CASE WHEN asti. STATUS = 'FAILED' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS FAILED, sum(CASE WHEN asti. STATUS = 'QUEUE' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS QUEUE FROM asgard_saga_instance asi LEFT JOIN asgard_orch_saga aos ON asi.SAGA_CODE = aos. CODE LEFT OUTER JOIN asgard_saga_task_instance asti ON asi.ID = asti.SAGA_INSTANCE_ID WHERE asi.ID=#{id} GROUP BY asi.ID
